text: These military supplies were pillaged after a successful siege.
Military supplies were consumed to stabilise the settlement.
%n Siege Towers per item (at siege escalation)
[[b]]CHARGE RESISTANCE[[/b]]\\n\\n Determines how solidly this unit can withstand enemy charges. Only functions when the unit is braced.
Fire Resistance: %d%%||Damage of flaming attacks is reduced by this amount.
Inflicts less damage and has reduced accuracy but suppresses targets.
[[b]]BONUS VS. INFANTRY[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases melee damage against infantry.
[[b]]BONUS VS. CAVALRY[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases melee damage against cavalry.
[[b]]MELEE HIT BONUS[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases a unit's hit chance at all times by decreasing the enemy's melee evasion.
[[b]]MELEE EVASION[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases the chance of evading melee damage from front and side. The enemy's charge bonus decreases it.
[[b]]ARMOUR[[/b]]\\n\\n Decreases standard melee, ranged and explosion damages. Doesn't help against armour-piercing damage.
Each character in Sun Ce's faction grants him shared expertise points once they reach rank 5. At ranks 9, 12 and 15 they generate one extra point respectively.
